title: What are the benefits of an O Level certificate? - Quora

response.answer_text: First let us answer what O-level is? In simple terms O-level is secondary education . O-level is the foundation for every student . Here is where you learn the basics for University studies . Even if you don’t want to go for higher education, O-level is still good for you. O-level certificate helps you get in to some Universities . However, prestigious universities will want students to continue further into A-levels before starting University.
